FRAXConvertible().details: Returns information on how much FRAX is convertible via current LP tokens.

params.DAO: The administrator of this contract (intended to be ZivoeDAO).

forwardYield().details: This forwards yield to the YDL in the form of FRAX.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

pullFromLockerMulti(address[]).details: This burns LP tokens from the ZVE MetaPool, and returns resulting coins back to the DAO.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

pullFromLockerPartial(address,uint256).details: This burns a partial amount of LP tokens from the ZVE MetaPool, and returns resulting coins back to the DAO.

params.amount: The amount of LP tokens to burn.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

pushToLockerMulti(address[],uint256[]).details: This pulls capital from the DAO, does any necessary pre-conversions, and adds liquidity into ZVE MetaPool.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipAndLock(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

FRAXConvertible().notice: The withdrawal mechanism is ZVE_3CRV_MP_TOKEN => 3CRV => Frax.

pullFromLocker(address).notice: Migrates entire ERC20 balance from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC721(address,uint256,byt.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint.notice: Migrates ERC721s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiPartial(address[],uin.notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pushToLocker(address,uint256).notice: Migrates specific amount of ERC20 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],ui.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC721(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint25.notice: Migrates ERC721s from owner() to locker.

@dev    This burns LP tokens from the ZVE MetaPool, and returns resulting coins back to the DAO.
 @param  assets The assets to return.
@dev    This forwards yield to the YDL in the form of FRAX.
